addr: 29 Little West 12th Street New York, NY 10014
title: Movable Play - December 1
desc:
Brought to you by mobile games studio? Dots ?and videogame arts and culture publication? Kill Screen , Movable Play is a free series of monthly talks?bringing together great minds from the worlds of design and business to encourage the ascent of beautiful, design forward mobile games.? 
 December Speakers: 
 ?a??l Bekta? (chkkl), ? Creator of  Vektor 
 chkkl is a developer, designer and an illustrator whose work covers film, animation, comics and games. He also gives lectures on storyboarding and visual fx post-production at Bilgi University.? 
 Jesse Divnich,? VP of Product Strategy at Tilting Point 
 Jesse Divnich is vice-president of product strategy and insights at Tilting Point, a partnership firm for independent game developers.? Over his 14 years in the industry, Jesse has become one of the most widely referenced analysts and trusted advisers to major game publishers, developers and investors. 
 Edgar Castro,? Creator of  Howl 
 Edgar graduated from Parsons The New School for Design with a BFA in Design and Technology and I'm currently working for Fabraz on a new game. If not making or playing games, he's watching tv, listening to music or playing guitar.
